title: League won't reinstall, I keep getting "Unspecified error occurred" message.
body:
Decided to reinstall League since the old shortcut on my computer stopped working and it would crash when I clicked on it. So I deleted everything Riot Games/League related from my pc and then I reinstalled it. Unfortunately, I keep getting the "Update Failed, Unspecified error occurred" screen right after I open League. Is there any way to fix this? 

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: This update failed error can happen if your OS settings is preventing access to your game files.  Run through the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore that access, and get updated to the new version.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I followed the steps but I'm still getting the same message, I don't know why :(
When I try to run it as an administrator it adds a "lockfile" to the folders in League of Legends on my computer. I dunno if that has something to do with it, but I'm just guessing at this point. 

I really wanna get back to playing League :/
